txt.en:
[placeholder],

You will find me at a ruin bearing my name. The ruin stands atop a cliff overlooking the Bruinen, south beyond the Bruinen Gorges. 

I look forward to meeting you.

Candelleth

'I am pleased that you have arrived. Angmarim skulk through this land, and there are refugees who need assistance. I will remain vigilant for any news of why these ill-meaning Men crawl through our lands.\n\n'If you desire to help, there would be those who are grateful and would offer rewards.'
Cendelleth, an Elf dwelling in the Trollshaws, sent a message to you, asking for aid.
Talk to Candelleth at Echad Candelleth in Tal Bruinen

Echad Candelleth in Tal Bruinen rests atop a cliff overlooking the great river. You are to seek out Candelleth there.\n\nCandelleth's message found you, and she awaits your arrival at the ruins of Echad Candelleth.
